Great game from valve's golden age. Fun puzzles, that range from easy to ones you really have to think hard about, to play alone or with a friend. Touching, mysterious and greatly interesting singleplayer story. Endless original content in the community workshop. Worth every penny.

Beautiful voice acting and a brilliant story-line which continues on from the first game but also works as a stand-alone game. You still have loads of fun with the portals in a level-based system like in the first game but also puzzles which travel outside of the test-area.
